entities.name: gawp
entities.description: Grawp is a giant who is being pulled by Hagrid. He has a boulderish face and is ripping pine trees away from the ground with detached pleasure.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is leading Harry and Hermione back into the trees after pulling Grawp through the forest. He is pinching his nose due to a bleeding injury.

relationships.description: Hagrid is pulling Grawp through the forest, ripping pine trees away from the ground with detached pleasure.
Hagrid is leading Hermione back into the trees after pulling Grawp through the forest.
